Class Project

java.lang.Object
Project
public class Project extends Object
This Project class is a class that is used to create project objects
Since:
2021-06-09
Version:
2.0
Author:
egorzakharov

    This is a constructor used to create Project objects

    Modifier and Type
    Method

    fileString()
    This is a method that is used to return a string format of all the project details that can be easily stored and read from a text file by the program

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project​(int number, String name, String building, String address, int erf, double totalDue, double totalPaid, String deadline, Person architect, Person contractor, Person customer, Boolean finalized, String completionDate)
      This is a constructor used to create Project objects
      Parameters:
      number - int parameter for project number
      name - String parameter for project name
      building - String parameter for building type
      address - String parameter for building type
      erf - parameter for project erf number
      totalDue - double parameter for the total amount due for the project
      totalPaid - double parameter for the total amount paid for the project
      deadline - String parameter for the deadline date of the project
      architect - Person parameter for the architect assigned to the project
      contractor - Person parameter for the contractor assigned to the project
      customer - Person parameter for the customer assigned to the project
      finalized - boolean parameter for the finalized status of the project
      completionDate - String parameter for the completion date of the project

  • Method Details

    • setDeadline

      public void setDeadline​(String deadline)
      This is a void method used to set (update) the due date of the project
      Parameters:
      deadline - the new deadline for the project

    • setTotalAmount

      public void setTotalAmount​(double totalAmount)
      This is a void method used to set (update) the total amount paid for the project
      Parameters:
      totalAmount - the new total amount paid for the project

    • finalizeProject

      public void finalizeProject()
      This is a void method used to set the finalized boolean for the project to true once the project has been finalized by the user

    • setCompletionDate

      public void setCompletionDate​(String completionDate)
      This is a void method used to set the completion date for the project to current date once the project has been finalized by the user
      Parameters:
      completionDate - the completion date (current date) of when the project was finalized

    • invoice

      public String invoice()
      This is a method used to return an invoice for the customer that the project is assigned to
      Returns:
      returns a string representing an invoice that includes the customers name, contact details and amount due

    • toString

      public String toString()
      This is a method used to return a string format of all the project details
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      returns a string with all the project details

    • fileString

      public String fileString()
      This is a method that is used to return a string format of all the project details that can be easily stored and read from a text file by the program
      Returns:
      returns a string format with all the project details in an efficient text file format
